S.FORM: badas tingalaw ku kabi nu badas. siwkay nu babaungen badas sa, u nipaluma, taneng mukan, asu'. sabelen ku badas camelen ku titi', asu'. u heci ku kakaenen nu mita. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika ( :Psophocarpus tetragonolobus) , , , , , , , . The winged bean (Psophocarpus tetragonolobus), also known as the Goa bean, four angled bean, four cornered bean, Manila bean, Dragon bean, is a tropical legume plant native to New Guinea. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
